com.rift.coad.lib.security.user
Class UserSessionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.security.user.UserSessionManager

public class UserSessionManager
extends java.lang.Object

The user session manager is responsible for creating new session for users.

Nested Class Summary
 class UserSessionManager.TimeoutThread
          This is a thread that is responsible for cleaning up the old user sessions.
 class UserSessionManager.UserSessionIndex
          This object is responsible for maintaining the user session

Parameters:

UserException

addUserSession

public void addUserSession(UserSession user)
                    throws UserException
This method adds a session for a user to the user session index so that it can be refered to later. It does not over ride the session on the thread as this will be done when the thread Sudo's to that user.

Parameters:
user - The user
Throws:
UserException

getSessionById

public UserSession getSessionById(java.lang.String sessionId)
                           throws UserException
This method returns the user session id.

Parameters:
sessionId - The references to the user session id.
Returns:
The reference to the user session object.
Throws:
UserException
